attributes.action: Hold a referendum on ceasing UK participation in the Ukraine and Russia War
attributes.additional_details: Continued and escalated participation in this war is not in the interests of our nation.
attributes.background: Ceasing military support (i.e. missiles, planes, tanks), as this risks bringing the UK directly into war with Russia.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629895
